channel.title: Who should I contact if I have a Business/Marketing/AMA Proposals for Radix?
channel.description:
The only official way is to send an email to hello@radixdlt.com for any proposals.
Enquiries are not accepted via Telegram, Discord or on the Radix Talk forum,
